content: this eye-catching crochet blanket showcases a radiant symphony of square motifs thoughtfully arranged to create a gentle gradient from blazing oranges to soft sun-kissed hues crafted with luxurious bernat lattice yarn this throw offers a cozy embrace reminiscent of the fading warmth of a summer evening sky surprisingly simple to create you ll master motif assembly working in rounds seaming double_crochet easy color transitions and more it s a project you ll be proud to call your own materials bernat® lattice™ 7 8 oz/220 g 389 yds/356 m main color mc golden hour 19008 5 balls or 1665 yds/1522 m contrast a rust mix 19007 3 balls or 836 yds/764 m gauges 16 single_crochet single_crochet and 18 row = 4 10 cm motif = approx 6¼ 16 cm square measurements approximately approx 53½ x 62½ 136 by 159 cm
